channel.title: VILLAS
channel.description: Virtually Interconnected Laboratories for LArge systems Simulation/emulation

item.title: The VILLAS development continues
item.description:
The VILLAS development continues..
The VILLAS project is officially ended. However main product of the project “VILLASframework” is still under ongoing development and used in new research projects.
Up-to-date information about the software developments and ongoing research around VILLAS can be found at the FEIN e.V project web-site.
A more in-depth description of the project can also be found at the JARA Energy Annual Report.
This project is now archived. No further updates are to be expected.

item.title: VILLASframework
item.description:
VILLASframework
VILLASframework has been released as open source software under the GPLv3 license.
Details about the project can be found on its project page.

item.title: New Website
item.description:
Website is online
The first version of VILLAS project website is online.
